title: amma nimma maga
sahitya:
amma nimma maga summaniruvanalla janma janmadi ranga inta laNDanu nODamma


caraNam 1    nIrige hOguva nAriyaranu kaNDu moreya tiruhi idirAgi nindu 
dAriyanaDagaTTi nIrige sungavu Ura ellara kUDe bhaNDu mADida nODamma
    caraNam 2    pashuva karevutiha shashi mukhiyara kaNDu hasanAgiye mudde bandu nindu 
hosapari vidhadi hOriya hAge ninna maga hosa pariyali namma bhaNDu mADida nODamma
    caraNam 3    gOkuladoLaguLLa bEkAdanganeyara kAku mADida kANe ranga ninnANe 
sAku sAku ninna magage buddhiya hELe shrIkAnta purandara viTTala banda manege
